label: TF016
info_overview:
The Heatit Z-Wave is an electronic thermostat for floor heating in a standard wall box. The thermostat has a built-in Z-Wave chip that can be connected with Home Automation systems.

Heatit Z-Wave is equipped with a single pole switch and fits into most System 55 frames (Elko RS16, Schneider Exxact, Gira, Jung etc.) The thermostat can withstand a load of max 16A / 3600W at 230V. At higher loads the thermostat must control a contactor. The thermostat may be connected to two wired external sensors.

The thermostat has the capacity of up to 8 associations (relays, wall plugs etc.)

The thermostat is designed for electrical heating.
info_inclusion: To include the thermostat to your home automation gateway, press Center (confirm) for 10 seconds. The display will show OFF. Press Right (down) 4 times till you see Con in the display. Now start add device in your home automation software. Start inclusion mode by pressing Center (confirm) for approximately 2 seconds. The inclusion/exclusion icon will appear in the display. Confirmation will show Inc/EcL in the display. If inclusion fails, Err (error) will appear. Leave programming mode by choosing ESC in menu. Your thermostat is ready for use with default settings

options.label: Energy Save Heat
options.overview: ECO – mode: Is a setback mode that you can use if the thermostat is installed in a room or a house that is rarely used.

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

<thing:thing-descriptions bindingId="zwave"

  <thing-type id="thermofloor_tf016_01_008" listed="false">
    <label>TF016 ZWave Thermostat</label>
    <description>ZWave Thermostat</description>

    <!-- CHANNEL DEFINITIONS -->
    <channels>
      <channel id="sensor_temperature" typeId="sensor_temperature">
        <label>Sensor (temperature)</label>
        <properties>
          <property name="binding:*:DecimalType">SENSOR_MULTILEVEL;type=TEMPERATURE</property>
        </properties>
      </channel>
      <channel id="thermostat_mode" typeId="thermofloor_tf016_01_008_thermostat_mode">
        <label>Thermostat mode</label>
        <properties>
          <property name="binding:*:DecimalType">THERMOSTAT_MODE</property>
        </properties>
      </channel>
      <channel id="thermostat_setpoint_heating" typeId="thermostat_setpoint">
        <label>Setpoint (heating)</label>
        <properties>
          <property name="binding:*:DecimalType">THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT;type=HEATING</property>
        </properties>
      </channel>
      <channel id="thermostat_setpoint_heating_econ" typeId="thermostat_setpoint">
        <label>Setpoint (heating economy)</label>
        <properties>
          <property name="binding:*:DecimalType">THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT;type=HEATING_ECON</property>
        </properties>
      </channel>
      <channel id="thermostat_setpoint_furnace" typeId="thermostat_setpoint">
        <label>Setpoint (furnace)</label>
        <properties>
          <property name="binding:*:DecimalType">THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT;type=FURNACE</property>
        </properties>
      </channel>
	  <channel id="thermostat_sensor_mode" typeId="thermofloor_tf016_01_008_sensor_mode">
        <label>Sensor mode</label>
        <properties>
          <property name="binding:*:DecimalType">THERMOSTAT_SENSOR_MODE</property>
        </properties>
      </channel>
    </channels>

    <!-- DEVICE PROPERTY DEFINITIONS -->
    <properties>
      <property name="vendor">ThermoFloor</property>
      <property name="modelId">TF016</property>
      <property name="manufacturerId">019B</property>
      <property name="manufacturerRef">0001:0001</property>
      <property name="versionMin">1.8</property>
      <property name="dbReference">412</property>
      <property name="defaultAssociations">1</property>
    </properties>

    <!-- CONFIGURATION DESCRIPTIONS -->
    <config-description>

      <!-- PARAMETER DEFINITIONS -->
      <parameter-group name="configuration">
        <context>setup</context>
        <label>Configuration Parameters</label>
      </parameter-group>

      <parameter name="config_1_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration">
        <label>1: Operation mode</label>
        <default>1</default>
        <options>
          <option value="0">OFF</option>
          <option value="1">HEAT</option>
          <option value="2">COOL</option>
          <option value="11">ENERGY SAVE HEAT</option>
        </options>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_2_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration">
        <label>2: Sensor mode</label>
        <default>1</default>
        <options>
          <option value="0">F-mode</option>
          <option value="1">A-mode</option>
          <option value="2">AF-mode</option>
          <option value="3">A2-mode</option>
          <option value="4">P-mode</option>
          <option value="5">FP-mode</option>
        </options>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_3_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration">
        <label>3: Floor sensor type</label>
        <default>0</default>
        <options>
          <option value="0">10k NTC</option>
          <option value="1">12k NTC</option>
          <option value="2">15k NTC</option>
          <option value="3">22k NTC</option>
          <option value="4">33k NTC</option>
          <option value="5">47k NTC</option>
        </options>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_4_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="3" max="30">
        <label>4: DIFF l. Temperature control Hysteresis</label>
        <description>Range 3-30 (0.3°C 3.0°C)</description>
        <default>5</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_5_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="50" max="400">
        <label>5: FLo, Floor min limit</label>
        <description>Range 50-400 (5.0°C 40.0°C)</description>
        <default>50</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_6_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="50" max="400">
        <label>6: FHi, Floor max limit</label>
        <description>Range 50-400 (5.0°C 40.0°C)</description>
        <default>400</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_7_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="50" max="400">
        <label>7: ALo, Air min limit</label>
        <description>Range 50-400 (5.0°C 40.0°C)</description>
        <default>50</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_8_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="50" max="400">
        <label>8: AHi, Air max limit</label>
        <description>Range 50-400 (5.0°C 40.0°C)</description>
        <default>400</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_9_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="9">
        <label>9: PLo, FP-mode P setting</label>
        <default>0</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_10_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="50" max="400">
        <label>10: CO mode setpoint</label>
        <description>Range 50-400 (5.0°C 40.0°C)</description>
        <default>210</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_11_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="50" max="400">
        <label>11: ECO mode setpoint</label>
        <description>Range 50-400 (5.0°C 40.0°C)</description>
        <default>180</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_12_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="10">
        <label>12: P setting</label>
        <default>2</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_13_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="50" max="400">
        <label>13: COOL setpoint</label>
        <description>Only if cooling enabled. Range 50-400 (5.0°C 40.0°C)</description>
        <default>210</default>
      </parameter>

      <!-- ASSOCIATION DEFINITIONS -->
      <parameter-group name="association">
        <context>link</context>
        <label>Association Groups</label>
      </parameter-group>

      <parameter name="group_1" type="text" groupName="association" multiple="true">
        <label>1: Lifeline</label>
        <multipleLimit>8</multipleLimit>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="group_2" type="text" groupName="association" multiple="true">
        <label>2: On/Off control</label>
        <multipleLimit>8</multipleLimit>
      </parameter>

    </config-description>

  </thing-type>

  <channel-type id="thermofloor_tf016_01_008_thermostat_mode">
    <item-type>Number</item-type>
    <label>Thermostat Mode</label>
    <description>Sets the thermostat mode</description>
    <category>Temperature</category>
    <state pattern="%s">
      <options>
        <option value="2">Cool</option>
        <option value="11">Economy Heat</option>
        <option value="0">Off</option>
        <option value="1">Heat</option>
      </options>
    </state>
  </channel-type>
  
  <channel-type id="thermofloor_tf016_01_008_sensor_mode">
    <item-type>Number</item-type>
    <label>Sensor Mode</label>
    <description>Sets the sensor mode</description>
    <category>Temperature</category>
    <state pattern="%s">
      <options>
        <option value="0">F-mode</option>
        <option value="1">A-mode</option>
        <option value="2">AF-mode</option>
        <option value="3">A2-mode</option>
        <option value="4">P-mode</option>
        <option value="5">FP-mode</option>
      </options>
    </state>
  </channel-type>

</thing:thing-descriptions>
